column1: '''''Report on the Excavation of the Prehistoric, Roman, and Post-Roman Site in Lydney Park, Gloucestershire''''' was published in July [[1932]]. [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] contributed with an essay, "[[The Name 'Nodens']]", included as Appendix I (pp. 132-7). The book was printed in 1,150 copies.<ref>{{webcite
column4: articlename=Report on the Excavation in Lydney Park. 1932
